conversion_verification.notes: True 3D isometric cutaway transformation successfully executed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection, consistent wall thickness, and clear volumetric space without perspective distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the floor plan. Room adjacencies and wall positions are nearly perfect. Minor simplification of the stairs.

interior_elements.notes: Excellent placement of furniture matching the 2D layout. Bathroom fixtures and kitchen layout are accurately represented.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean aesthetic, high-quality rendering, and distinct material separation. No UI contamination.

detected_errors.description: The kitchen island/table is more prominent in 3D than the simple counter silhouette suggests in 2D.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and clean 3D conversion that maintains exact geometric proportions and furniture placement from the source plan.
